original_text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, so must the Son of Man be lifted up,
korean_text: 모세가 광야에서 뱀을 든 것 같이 인자도 들려야 하리니

sentences.original_text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness,
so must the Son of Man be lifted up,
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 같이 인자도 들어 올려져야 하리라,
